name: Space Game (NicoSoft)
description:
Un juego en el que el objetivo es sumar puntos explotando asteroides, pero no será tan fácil... los asteroides que no destruyas, te descontarán puntos. El camino es largo, pero unos bonus te ayudarán a conseguirlo... si los eliges bien.

No es solo disparar, tendrás que evaluar los riesgos constantemente para poder alcanzar la meta con mayor rapidez.

A game in which the objective is to score points by exploding asteroids, but it won't be that easy ... the asteroids that you don't destroy will deduct points. The road is long, but some bonuses will help you to achieve it ... if you choose them well.

It is not just shooting, you will have to constantly assess the risks in order to reach the goal more quickly.

"K" to fire!
